interestingcomments.content:
I'm starting to consider jumping back into photography with my dream camera. /!/ So, I need a camera. I say this knowing that times have been rough but the only thing that has kept me calm in stressful times, has been photography. I am currently using my phone consistently to take photos because my old t3i bit the dust a few years back.

Now that I have the income, I want to jump back in with the camera that I have been chasing since it came out

The A7iii. This thing has been my dream camera since I got to spend an hour with it.

Now here's the thing, in canada, the thing is 3200 Canadian rupees.

I want to hear from people who own it, am I crazy for wanting to push for it for that reason?
